pilots.partner: Clean Water and Sanitation Africa Cameroon
pilots.notes: Clean Water and Sanitation Africa Cameroon - promoting proper hygiene and sanitation. Lucent deployed 4 filters at community water points.
pilots.shortBlurb: CWASAF is a non-profit organization promoting proper hygiene, sanitation, and environmental protection in Cameroon. Lucent installed 4 filters across community water points to provide reliable daily access to safe drinking water.

pilots.notes: Safe, affordable women's hostel near Infopark. Lucent installed 4 filters to provide on-site potable water.
pilots.shortBlurb: Women's hostel near Infopark, Kakkanad. Lucent installed 4 filters to provide safe, on-site drinking water for residents and staff.
